text.en: Place the cups from your kit on the challenge field the way you can see in the picture. Stand your robot at the start line and roll a ball to knock down all 4 cups at the other end of the field.

Your robot must stand at the start line.
You have got 3 trials.

You knocked down 1-2 cups.=Good job! Let's try again.
You knocked down 3 cups.=Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You knocked down all 4 cups.=You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
Hit 1-2 cups=5 points
Hit 3 cups=10 points
Hit all 4 cups=5 points
We would love to see your scores.
